## Installing Packages

```{Installing and Loading Packages}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("lubridate")
install.packages("ggplot2")

library("tidyverse")
library("lubridate")
library("ggplot2")
```

## Collecting Data

```{Collecting Data - CSV files}
getwd()
setwd("/cloud/project/Capstone_Case_Study_1")

June_2021 <- read_csv("2021_June_Trip_Data.csv")
July_2021 <- read_csv("2021_July_Trip_Data.csv")
August_2021 <- read_csv("2021_August_Trip_Data.csv")
September_2021 <- read_csv("2021_September_Trip_Data.csv")
October_2021 <- read_csv("2021_October_Trip_Data.csv")
November_2021 <- read_csv("2021_November_Trip_Data.csv")
December_2021 <- read_csv("2021_December_Trip_Data.csv")
January_2022 <- read_csv("2022_January_Trip_Data.csv")
February_2022 <- read_csv("2022_February_Trip_Data.csv")
March_2022 <- read_csv("2022_March_Trip_Data.csv")
April_2022 <- read_csv("2022_April_Trip_Data.csv")
May_2022 <- read_csv("2022_May_Trip_Data.csv")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
